author: Tristan Rhodes (https://victrisgames.itch.io/)
description:
Provides values based on picked object instances.  Useful for camera tracking, flocking behaviors, and more.

Included expressions:

Center position (average)
- X center position 
- Y center position

Center position (middle)
- X center position
- Y center position 

Based on center of objects:
- Minimum X position
- Maximum X position
- Minimum Y position
- Maximum Y position

Based on AABB of objects:
- Minimum X position
- Maximum X position
- Minimum Y position
- Maximum Y position

Force related expressions:
- Average horizontal force (X)
- Average vertical force (Y)
name: ValuesOfMultipleObjects
shortDescription: Values of picked object instances (including position and velocity)
